violent protests. Sally Hunt , general secretary of the University and College Union( UCU) accused the coalition of "sneaking" the student loan rate changes out in the bill. She said: The general public can see this for what it is- a stealth tax on learning and achievement- and it doesn't matter what piece of legislation the Government tries to hide it in. Graduate unemployment is at a 10-year high, yet the Government has introduced policies to increase student debt to record levels and then charge even higher rates of interest. Surely even they will now stop trying to spin these damaging unfair policies as progressive. Further measures included in the White Paper were plans to overhaul the teacher training process, sweeping reforms of qualifications and the introduction of a reading test for six-year-olds. Eric Schmidt is stepping down as CEO of Google, and Larry Page is taking over the company just announced in its earnings release. Eric Schmidt will become Executive Chairman focused on, deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership, the company says. Google's other cofounder, Sergey Brin will take a more active role in strategic projects including product. Eric Schmidt joked about the switch on Twitter, saying
